评论详情: It is exactly what I was looking for. I bought the 6X. I usually wear a 30W/32W in plus size brands like Lane Bryant or Catherine’s, and it fits well. The shoulder seam actually sits at my shoulder instead of falling onto the arm because many manufacturers assume plus size women have insanely broad shoulders. The sleeves could be a hair longer to suit my preferences (I’m 5’8”) but it’s not so short that it looks funny. The color is on the darker range of burgundy.
Soft. Great fit. Comfortable. I will enjoy it for years.
Very nice looking cardigan, will go with everything. Very soft and comfy. True to size.
Very light weight.  A little baggy after wearing twice.  Simple line, soft weave, good value.

I bought 4 of these sweaters because I love them! They're lightweight, the colors are gorgeous, and they're made well. True to size. I put them in the washer on gentle cycle and then the dryer for just a few minutes and then air dry. They hold up well, don't lose they're shape and colors don't run or fade. Mostly I love the way they look and fit! Great buy!

I absolutely love the mustard yellow color of this cardigan it’s so vibrant and cheerful! The fabric is on the thinner side, but it feels well-made, so here’s hoping it holds up over time. As a short, plus-size woman, I really appreciate the length. It’s just the right length not too long but still long enough to provide the perfect amount of coverage for my curves.  Overall, it’s a great lightweight cardigan that fits well and flatters my shape. I’d give it five stars if the material were just a bit thicker, but it’s still a great addition to my wardrobe!
This is one of those must have in your wardrobe. The fit and material are great, and will be a staple in my closet for those days that start cool and warm up later in the day.

the neckline drops too low on my body that will require wearing something under it defeating my purpose of wearing a stand alone sweater in the summer.  It is appropriately a light weight knit for summer so the under garment must be a body fitted tank top.  I am 5'-8" tall, 146 to 148lbs. with an in between sizes bust size (lost weight and went from C to B+ cup) and it fits nicely.  No stretching across the bust whereby the buttons show a gap.  I am somewhat small-boned with skinny arms.If you are built like myself, but bustier, it should show some nice decolletage without having to wear anything else but a bra.Have yet to wash it and I hope it doesn't shrink.  I will place it in a netted bag, wash in cold water with other like-colored clothes,  dry in dryer for 5-minutes damp and lay across a towel while on the towel rack to let it slowly dry.  This usually keeps 'em from shrinking and they dry without wrinkles and preserves the color.  So, I'm gonna keep it.
